name: The Nutcracker by BigTopBallet
description:
Big Top Ballet's Seasonal Teaser Release of The Nutcracker!

For 2016 play 'The Waltz of the Flowers' suite with Ill-Esha's musical recomposition of Tchaikovsky's Waltz!

A Dress up game like no other!

Match costumes to color changes in snowflakes dressing as many ballerinas as you can before the music stops!
